title: Korean Silver Bird International brings investments in Sri Lanka
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma – (Pix by: Sudath Silva) A Korean trade delegation representing Silver Bird International (Pvt) Ltd has pledged their support to President Mahinda Rajapaksa to bring solid investments to rebuild Sri Lanka.
